panels.description: Average GPU memory utilization per GPU across all active GPUs (>0%) in the cluster.

targets.expr: (sum((task_gpu_percent > bool 0) * task_gpu_mem_percent) / count(task_gpu_percent>0)) OR on() vector(0)
